</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the life state of the given unit.
{<template><title>!</title></template>
! <template><title>arma2</title></template>
! <template><title>arma3</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* "ALIVE"
* "DEAD"
* "DEAD-RESPAWN"
* "DEAD-SWITCHING"
* "ASLEEP"
* "UNCONSCIOUS"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* "HEALTHY"
* "DEAD"
* "DEAD-RESPAWN"
* "DEAD-SWITCHING"
* "INCAPACITATED"
* "INJURED"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3 </title><part><name index="1"/><value> In <template><title>arma3</title></template>, [[lifeState]] seems to change to "INJURED" when <template><title>Inline code </title><part><name index="1"/><value> [[damage]] aliveUnit ><template><title>=</title></template> 0.1</value></part></template> (0.1 seeming to be the value defined in config under <template><title>sic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"InjuredTreshold"</value></part></template>).</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lifeState]] unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _lifeState = [[lifeState]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setUnconscious]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
